Title: Relates to homegrown food operations
Summary: Enacts the homegrown foods act to exempt the production and sale of certain homegrown food products grown and processed at or in a private residence from certain food processing licensure requirements where the food is sold directly to consumers and total sales do not exceed $12,500.
LawCode: Add Art 20-A §§251-a - 251-f, amd §251-z-2, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the "homegrown foods act" to permit the sale of certain foods and food products without a license under certain conditions
